display_long_description:
# Background Story
Peace was short-lived. An unknown enemy, whose origins remain a mystery, spreads rapidly through the galaxy. A massive military spaceport is constructed, and the battleships gather, preparing for war. The stage is set for a conflict that could determine the fate and the future of mankind.

# Gameplay

Join an interstellar strike team and fight together with up to five other players against alien robots. Control the systems of your battleship, climb into an interceptor for space combat or land on planets to fight the robots face-to-face. Unlock more fighters and equipment, earn credits, badges, and promotions. Experience the cockpits of battleship, interceptors and ground vehicles in exciting action. Repair the ship systems and collect resources to receive rewards. To ensure fair and peaceful interaction, all rewards are distributed equally to all participating players in a session.

# Features

- 6 Player Co-op
- Immersive cockpit experiences
- Control all joysticks & throttles with your hands
- Space combat
- Ground operations
- Different mission types
- Versatile equipment
- Character individualization
- Spacial voice chat

# Can I play solo?

You can play solo by starting a private session. The lower difficulties should be doable.

# Early Access

As the game is in Early Access, minor errors and inconsistencies may still occur, even though the game has already gone through extensive testing. The game is available in English, German, French and Spanish.
